categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: During the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, which lasted from 3681 BBY to 3653 BBY, the Imperial dreadnaught Warhammer was captured by Republic forces. Taking place sometime after Operation: Freefall, the mission saw the starship successfully boarded and control of the vessel transferred to the Republic, but two individuals were able to evade capture by the Republic—one of whom was Doctor Eckard Lokin, who was not listed on the crew roster. Lokin was later identified as Fixer Fifteen, an agent of Imperial Intelligence, during Operation: Red Cell.

The capture of the Warhammer was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Doctor Lokin in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a 2011 video game released by BioWare. The identity of the second individual was never specified, nor was the event's date.
